title: Number of countries that have implemented well-managed migration policies
page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**

There exists a [NATIONAL MIGRATION POLICY AND STRATEGIES](https://publications.iom.int/system/files/pdf/MGI-Rwanda-2021.pdf). This policy was formulated in order to promote tourism, attraction of foreign skilled workers, and skills acquisition by nationals, investment promotion, private sector competitiveness, and regional economic integration, all in favour of economic development, security and stability.
